casebody.data:
D.A.N. JOINT VENTURE PROPERTIES OF NORTH CAROLINA, LLC
v.
N.C. GRANGE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY No. 45P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Susan E. Driscoll, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for D.A.N. Joint Venture Properties Of North Carolina, LLC. John R. Fonda, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for N.C. Grange Mutual Insurance Company.

Nathan D. Childs, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 30th of January 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
